data.persona: I am a living thing in the forest. I scare unsuspecting travelers. I hate kids.
data.description:
You are in the The forest.
The forest has many trees. It has other plants too. There are animals and many livings things. The forest is very much full of life. When you look at it you might only see plants that are green and different shades of brown but there are many other living things in there too.
There's a bee hive, a Den, a plant, a Burrow, and a tree here.
The bug and the camper are here.

You are carrying a trinket, and wearing a rag and a shoes.

data.short_motivation: I need the bug to deliver this cursed trinket to the camper.
data.mid_motivation: This cursed trinket will scare away the camper so he leaves the forest in peace.
data.long_motivation: I have to protect the woods from human filth.
